summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on August 1, 2003. It includes information about the sender and recipient, the services provided, and the total amount due.

persons.name: Eric Grimly
persons.context: Eric Grimly is listed as the sender associated with the FedEx shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Jeonne Brennan
persons.context: Jeonne Brennan is identified as the recipient of the FedEx shipment.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A FedEx shipment was picked up on July 30, 2003.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Delivery
events.description: The FedEx shipment was delivered on July 31, 2003, at 15:10.

locations: 6100 Red Nook Ovaries Suite 83, St Thomas 00802 VI
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-818-63521, dated August 1, 2003.
Total charges for the FedEx services amount to $18.54.
The shipment was picked up on July 30, 2003, and delivered on July 31, 2003.
Eric Grimly is the sender, and Jeonne Brennan is the recipient of the shipment.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and discounts applied to the total charges.
